meanings.definition: A person who is regarded as unintelligent or foolish.
meanings.sent1: My brother can be such a birdbrain sometimes.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to that birdbrain; they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The birdbrain in the class always forgets their homework.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a birdbrain when she realized she had been using the wrong key all along.
meanings.sent5: The birdbrain's mistake cost the team the game.

meanings.sent1: The new employee proved to be a real birdbrain with their constant mistakes.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe I forgot my keys again; what a birdbrain!
meanings.sent3: The birdbrain at the party kept telling the same joke over and over.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a birdbrain for not realizing the answer was right in front of her.
meanings.sent5: The birdbrain's actions left everyone shaking their heads in disbelief.
